Description: Switch to enable or disable benchmarking functionality for comparing model results with reference data.
Switch to optionally remove the last day of the year to ensure the benchmarked values have exactly 52 weeks."
Excel sheet name containing reference data.
Data unit (e.g. TWh or GW) for conversion to the base unit using the unit conversion factors defined in `benchmarking:unit_conversion`.

Unit: This is an Excel-like index, starting at 1.
Description: Column index or list of column indices to use as row index when reading tables.

Unit: This is an Excel-like index, starting at 1.
Description: Row number or list of row numbers to use as column headers when reading tables.
Number of rows to read from reference data.
Number of columns to read from reference data.
Names for index levels corresponding to `index_col`.
Names for column levels corresponding to `header`.
Mapping from model carrier names to reference data names.
